title: Contacts

founders.name: Polina Vitiuk
founders.details: Head of children's activities in the Ukrainian community in Pärnu. She has been in Estonia since March 2022. She came from the Dnipro region. She is a teacher-defectologist, preschool teacher. Active public figure, coordinator, volunteer. «With faith in our hearts, to victory!»

founders.name: Viktoriia Kuzmenko
founders.details: Coordinator of educational projects, teacher of grades 1-4, teacher of English, active public figure

founders.name: Tetiana Podolska
founders.details: Head of Integration Projects, Coordinator for Work with Ukrainians at the Department of Migration and Border Guard Service (2022-2024), public figure, volunteer

description:
All the founders of the organization actively worked on the formation and support of the Ukrainian community in Pärnu.

They assisted with paperwork, the formation of information platforms, and contributed to the psychological adaptation of women and children, and plan to continue to do so for the successful integration and support of their native cultural, creative, and educational center in Estonia.

It's time to unite to preserve culture, language, and traditions. Our society is open to new partnership projects and fresh ideas)))
imageAlt: Portrait of two siblings standing on field
